title: Malware has a terrible new way to get to your computer
description: There's a new avenue of attack for bad actors, and it's via Minecraft and other video games.

title: Apple event September 2022: live coverage for iPhone 14, Apple Watch Series 8, and more
description: Apple's "Far Out" event is happening now! Check here for all of the latest updates on the iPhone 14, Apple Watch Series 8, and more.

title: Intel admits to one key regret about its launch of Arc GPUs
description: Intel confirmed that the Arc A770 and Arc A750 graphics cards are launching very soon. Intel also shared a major regret about one of its key decisions.

title: Here’s why you need to update your Google Chrome right now
description: Google has just released a new Chrome update that fixes a severe vulnerability. Check how to protect yourself and make sure you have the right version.
